game.name: Minnie Mouse Surprise Cake
game.description:
Minnie Mouse Surprise Cake is one of the best free online cooking games to play for girls and boys from different age groups. It is a time when you will have to show off your chef skills to prepare an extremely scrumptious surprise cake in the shape of one of the most popular cartoon characters: Minnie Mouse. We are sure that this character is also the favourite of yours like us. Learn how to prepare the delicious cake here and apply its recipe in your real kitchen to surprise your friends and family.

Nothing could be better than preparing a surprise cake on the birthday of your best friend. Begin this brand new cooking game with mixing the baking powder, milk, sugar, flour and butter in a bowl. Now check it properly and pour the batter in two square trays with different sizes. Take an oven and bake them in it until they turn into a nice golden color. Use another bowl and blend some milk, a pinch of salt, vanilla extract, powdered sugar and butter in it. 

Collect the two bowls and divide this mixture in them in equal ratio. Add yellow food color in one bowl while the blue in the other one. Then you also have to take care of spreading the yellow colored butter-cream on the large-sized cake sponge and also spreading some sprinkles on it. Also spread some fondants on the edges. Use the blue coloured butter-cream on the small-sized cake sponge. Apply some pink fondant and colourful starts to decorate it perfectly. On the top of the yellow one, place the blue cake and then put a cute picture of your favorite character Minnie Mouse on the top of it. All the best to play the world popular cool html5 game!
